title: An Unexpected Frost
description: Tucker's grandson disappears and the bank threatens to forelcose on her farm.At the same time, Tucker's friend, Ella, is facing personal crises of her own.The tether that ties the hearts of these two women is stretched to the breaking point.Smiley Carter does his best to keep the friendships intact.Living in the midst of these emotional storms is April who struggles to find solace and comfort. The demons of regret and despair are beginning to haunt her dreams.As a result of the burden she bears, Tucker finds herself in a crisis of faith and asks the question, "Where is the person called God?!"
author: David  Johnson
